title: Riot games Match making
body:
So guys 
Riot is supposed to have this match making system where you're supposed to be against people that are either in the same rank or +1 or -1 rank than you are, or same level - ish 
SO 
There was a 5 man team including myself consisting of a silver 3, a silver 4, 2 unranked level 30's and a level 13
What I don't understand is why the other team consisted of a level 24, a Platinum, a Gold, and 2 silvers
Fine, the silvers and the level 24 are fine there, but in what universe is a Platinum and Gold against our team even acceptable ? am i overreacting or is this another one of rito's classic "just a prank bro" 
because this is total aids

replies.body:
You're complaining about matchmaking in normals? Who gives a shit?!

I got matched against Chief Praedyth this week, but I don't care since it doesn't matter anyway, it's just more of a challenge.

We asked them why this is even happening reguardless of our ranks and our team mate (the support) they constantly abused it and we were unable to compete against them being on a completely different level of skill, WHY IS YOUR MATCH MAKING SO BROKEN THIS IS THE 5th TIME THIS HAS HAPPENED I HAD TO VERSE A CHALLENGER LAST WEEK FIX YOUR !@#$ SHIT
